item.title: Cathy add a quote by Molly Harper
item.description: "I let Eli blow so much smoke up my skirt I'm surprised I don't have ass cancer." -- Molly Harper

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Gena Showalter
Cathy add a quote by Gena Showalter
item.description: "Giving up is the only sure way to fail." -- Gena Showalter

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "Lucifer's bouncing balls, Kitten, not again!" -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "Ask me if I sparkle and I’ll kill you where you stand.” (Bones)" -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Marguerite Duras
item.description: "Our mothers always remain the strangest, craziest people we've ever met." -- Marguerite Duras

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Cynthia Ozick
item.description: "We often take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude." -- Cynthia Ozick

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Irwin Shaw
item.description: "There are too many books I haven’t read, too many places I haven’t seen, too many memories I haven’t kept long enough." -- Irwin Shaw

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Julia Mills
item.description: "Of course, she should have known better than to go out with one of the muscle heads from her gym...It was a shame that a brain was optional equipment on his model, and he had not paid for the upgrade." -- Julia Mills
